Contradict fact: The expert's verdict contradicts the claim by stating that the photograph does not show a zunzuncito, but a miniature figurine.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or source to verify the accuracy of the photograph.

Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photograph shows the world's smallest bird, when it is actually a miniature figurine.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misidentifying the subject of the photograph and presenting it as a zunzuncito when it is not.
